import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-danhmuc', templateUrl: './danhmuc.component.html', styleUrls: ['./danhmuc.component.css'] }) export class DanhmucComponent { products = [ { name: 'Đồng hồ Rolex', price: 5000000, quantity: 2 }, { name: 'Đồng hồ Omega', price: 7000000, quantity: 1 }, { name: 'Đồng hồ Seiko', price: 2000000, quantity: 3 } ]; }
